About 3 Musketeers Candles

Founded by Andrea Archambault, 3 Musketeers Candles is dedicated to creating beautiful, hand-crafted candles right here in Maine. Our mission is to help you relax and enjoy unique, artisan scents that bring warmth and comfort to your home.
